headline: A place to retire
status:
26 November 2019
Helpful (1)
"A place to retire"
4.0
★★★★★
Current Employee
pros: No stress, meaningful, amazing campus right in the middle of nature, good benefits, better pay than other universities
cons: If you are young, you give up all aspects of social life as it is EXTREMELY boring and there are not a lot of young people. Also a standard bureaucratic workplace where nobody tries to be competitive seems the only way you'll be promoted is for your senior to retire.
